name: Sea_Trash
description:
Before Playing:

Controls for the Game:

A and D keys to Rotate the Trash Collector.

Left Click and Drag On the Trash Collector to Move it.

Right Click on the Trash Collector to select it.

Goals:
Clean the Poly boss sea!!!.....

By Collecting the Trash with Trash Collector the Pickup bag is the place to collect
the trash

Gamers!!.. get to my channel and hit the subscribe button!!..
